channel.title: Summit on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Dwarves Summit 2022 Engineering A Good Time
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Summit 2022: Engineering a good time We don’t treat team bonding the common way, because we understand our engineers. Most of our engineers don’t want running and getting sweaty on the beach for “team-building” activities, or pretending to smile in front of the travel agent’s camera. This was our first company get-together after 2 years of COVID. It was organized in ways that we can all look back to the progress we’ve made, pat ourselves on the back, have a blast together, and look forward to an even better 2023.
